short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to create shorturl from the Couleur Citron's new url shortener.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just click on the shortener icon to generate a random shortened url.
To custom you url, please go to http://coulc.it/ and choose custom url.
